content: a cozy cowl that is just right for keeping the chill away the stranded design features repeating flowers and vines and is very addictive smiley find it for free here https //www taddlecreekmag com/a-life-well-spent 1 gauge 28 stitches and 36 rounds in a 4-inch square in the charted design on the larger needles can be made in small/medium or medium/large measurements 19 20 5 inches in circumference yarn lichen and lace 80/20 sock yarn in one main colour and three contrasting colours mc will require approximately 180 yards ccs will require approximately 70 yards each needle size circular knitting needles 3 mm for the ribbing and 3 5 mm/u s 5 for the colour work colours used in sample linen main shrub sugar plum amber contrast materials one stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving in ends 1 https //www taddlecreekmag com/a-life-well-spent
